title: SLIPKNOT Seen Sporting A Few New Masks in Australia
description: Another tour cycle, another mask... The post SLIPKNOT Seen Sporting A Few New Masks in Australia appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 2 hours ago
text: During SLIPKNOT's most recent performance at Knotfest Australia – in which the world saw SLIPKNOT play "Gematria (The Killing Name)" for the first time ever – there were a few other new additions that also caught the attention of some fans. SLIPKNOT's masks are part of the reason the band is so identifiable. So, when slight changes happen, people notice. More specifically, fans noticed that COREY TAYLOR had gotten rid of the glowing red eyes from his previous mask. But, TAYLOR wasn't the only one –  it seems SID WILSON and JIM ROOT also wore slightly altered masks according to photos circulating. This comes after the bassist 'V-Man' debuted a new mask in August of last year. SLIPKNOT have four more tour dates in Australia before they have a short break ahead of their European festival circuit. Check out the dates below to see what EU festivals SLIPKNOT will be performing at this summer. Since SLIPKNOT have only announced one US festival appearance, it might not be too far out of the realm that Inkcarceration isn't the only festival the band may find themselves at stateside. You can also see the video of SLIPKNOT performing "Gematria (The Killing Name)" here. SLIPKNOT's Upcoming Festival DatesJune 4th, 2025 – Sweden Rock in Sölvesborg, SwedenJune 6th, 2025 – Rock Im Park in Nuremberg, GermanyJune 7th, 2025 – Rock Am Ring in Nürburg, GermanyJune 8th, 2025 – Heavy Weekend in Nancy, FranceJune 12th, 2025 – Rock for People in Hradec Kralove, Czech RepublicJune 13th, 2025 – Novarock in Nickelsdork, AustriaJune 14th, 2025 – Greenfield in Interlaken, SwitzerlandJune 17th, 2025 – Ferrara Summer Festival in Ferrara, ItalyJune 20th, 2025 – Graspop Metal Meeting in Dessel, BelgiumJune 21st, 2025 – Copenhell in Copenhagen, DenmarkJune 26th, 2025 – Rock Fest Barcelona in Barcelona, SpainJune 28th, 2025 – Resurrectionfest in Viveiro, SpainJune 29th, 2025 – Evil Live Festival in Lisbon, PortugalJuly 19th, 2025 – Inkcarceration Festival Want More Metal? html:
During SLIPKNOT's most recent performance at Knotfest Australia – in which the world saw SLIPKNOT play "Gematria (The Killing Name)" for the first time ever – there were a few other new additions that also caught the attention of some fans.

SLIPKNOT's masks are part of the reason the band is so identifiable. So, when slight changes happen, people notice. More specifically, fans noticed that COREY TAYLOR had gotten rid of the glowing red eyes from his previous mask. But, TAYLOR wasn't the only one –  it seems SID WILSON and JIM ROOT also wore slightly altered masks according to photos circulating.

This comes after the bassist 'V-Man' debuted a new mask in August of last year.

SLIPKNOT have four more tour dates in Australia before they have a short break ahead of their European festival circuit. Check out the dates below to see what EU festivals SLIPKNOT will be performing at this summer.

Since SLIPKNOT have only announced one US festival appearance, it might not be too far out of the realm that Inkcarceration isn't the only festival the band may find themselves at stateside.

You can also see the video of SLIPKNOT performing "Gematria (The Killing Name)" here.
